title: The Lifetime Cycle

description:
Writing is supposed to make you feel better...

***

Written by Zaikel03 and narrated by Jimmy Ferrer

***

Check out our reward tiers at patreon.com/creepypod

***

You can also subscribe to us on YouTube:

https://www.youtube.com/creepypod

***

Music by Steve Blizin

***

Title music by Alex Aldea

***

Intro/Outro Narration by Joe Stofko


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
